text: Levi nui tɛiti ti zɛba ti botii lɔɔzei: Keɠate mavofodaiti saama, niiti ge ɠɛni de: Amasayi ná-doun zunui Maɠate, Azalia ná-doun zunui Zowɛle. Melali mavofodaiti su, niiti ge ɠɛni de: Aɓidi ná-doun zunui Kise, naa ʋɛɛ Yeɠalelɛle ná-doun zunui Azalia ʋa. Gɛɛlɛson mavofodaiti su, niiti ge ɠɛni de: Zima ná-doun zunui Yoa, naa ʋɛɛ Yoa ná-doun zunui Edɛn ʋa.
